footer.newsletterCopy: Receive insights on connectivity, cybersecurity and onboard entertainment.

contact.subtitle: We design connectivity, security and entertainment systems tailored to every route and crew.
contact.success: Thank you for reaching out. We will reply within 24 business hours.

cookieBanner.title: Your privacy onboard
cookieBanner.description: We use technical and analytics cookies to provide support and enhance the experience. You can adjust preferences anytime.

hero.title: Solutions for onboard comfort
hero.subtitle: We design and implement smart technological systems that elevate onboard comfort and optimise the user experience across every voyage.

highlights.title: Certified engineering
highlights.description: Telematics and IT specialists integrating connectivity, cybersecurity and AV for luxury yachts.

highlights.title: Hands-on founders
highlights.description: Planning, onboard installation and support led directly by the core team.

highlights.title: Resilient architectures
highlights.description: Multi-WAN, proactive cybersecurity and monitoring so the yacht never disconnects.

servicesSection.title: Four pillars for a seamless onboard experience
servicesSection.description: Worldwide connectivity, cybersecurity, AV integration and IoT & surveillance deployed as a single ecosystem for crew and guests.

technologySection.title: Cutting-edge technology
technologySection.description: We work with Starlink, Ubiquiti, Peplink, Fortinet and Crestron to secure up-to-date infrastructure and global support.

partners.name: Starlink
partners.copy: LEO satellite connectivity and maritime hardware deployment.

partners.name: Ubiquiti
partners.copy: High-performance WiFi 6 mesh networks with centralised management.

partners.name: Peplink
partners.copy: Multi-WAN routers with bonding and automatic failover.

partners.name: Fortinet
partners.copy: Next-generation cybersecurity with Zero Trust policies.

partners.name: Crestron
partners.copy: AV control and automation with bespoke interfaces.

casesSection.heading: Recent implementations
casesSection.description: Multi-WAN engineering, Zero Trust policies and AV automation delivered alongside captains and shipyards.

cases.challenge: A charter fleet suffered dropouts when moving from limited coverage ports to open sea routes.
cases.solution: We designed a multi-WAN architecture with Peplink routers, maritime Starlink and centrally managed VSAT backup.
cases.result: Continuous connectivity through the season with 24/7 remote monitoring.

cases.challenge: Guest access jeopardised navigation and entertainment networks.
cases.solution: We implemented Fortinet NGFW, dedicated VLANs and multifactor authentication with SIEM monitoring.
cases.result: Zero incidents last season and a successful external audit.

cases.challenge: A 38 m yacht needed unified cinema, meeting and music experiences with easy crew control.
cases.solution: We integrated UHD matrix distribution, hidden audio, tailored scenes and Crestron panels synced with automation.
cases.result: Seamless multi-room experience fully adopted by crew and guests.

blogSection.title: Technical resources by Netnautica
blogSection.description: Explore our insights on connectivity, cybersecurity and onboard entertainment.

blogPosts.title: Starlink installation for superyachts: 2025 guide
blogPosts.excerpt: Everything you need to plan maritime Starlink connectivity: hardware, mounting and QoS optimisation.
content: We analyse hardware, mounting and antenna alignment for superyachts, including integration with Peplink routers and VSAT backups.
We share a checklist covering coverage, power, cabling and testing before departure.
blogPosts.seoDescription: Practical guide to integrate Starlink on superyachts with multi-WAN redundancy and Netnautica support.

blogPosts.title: Bonding technologies: resilient connectivity for yachts
blogPosts.excerpt: Discover how to blend multiple links into a single virtual interface to maximise availability and stability.
content: We cover bonding, load balancing and failover in Peplink routers leveraging Starlink, 4G/5G and VSAT.
We include QoS profile recommendations and remote monitoring with real-time alerts.
blogPosts.seoDescription: Bonding and multi-WAN for yachts: Netnautica recommendations for uninterrupted connectivity.

blogPosts.title: Digital fortress at sea: cybersecurity guide for crews
blogPosts.excerpt: Best practices, segmentation and continuous monitoring to protect navigation and entertainment networks.
content: We break down Zero Trust policies, hardened authentication and IoT firmware updates in maritime environments.
We propose an incident response plan and recurrent crew training.
blogPosts.seoDescription: Cybersecurity onboard: Netnautica recommendations for crews and superyachts.

items.question: How do you keep connectivity stable while sailing?
items.answer: We audit routes and ports, blend Starlink, 4G/5G and VSAT with multi-WAN routers and monitor the system 24/7.

items.question: Can you collaborate with our crew and contractors?
items.answer: Yes, we work alongside captains, shipyards and interior designers to integrate cabling, racks and automation without impacting finishes.

items.question: Does support cover cybersecurity and IoT?
items.answer: Our programme includes firewalls, segmentation, IoT updates and remote assistance to solve incidents in minutes.

contactCta.title: Ready for your next passage
contactCta.description: Share the current status of your yacht and we will deliver a realistic technology roadmap within 48 hours.

hero.title: Smart technology for seamless yachting
hero.description: We integrate connectivity, cybersecurity, AV and IoT with a boutique telematics engineering team.

intro.title: Methodology onboard
intro.description: Technical audit, tailored design, precise integration and 24/7 remote support for every passage.

steps.title: Technical audit
steps.description: We inspect racks, cabling, satellite coverage and crew needs.

steps.title: Custom design
steps.description: Modular architecture with the leading maritime manufacturers.

steps.title: Precise integration
steps.description: We coordinate with shipyards and interior teams respecting finishes and schedules.

steps.title: Continuous support
steps.description: 24/7 monitoring, planned visits and immediate remote assistance.

cta.title: Prepare your next passage with Netnautica
cta.description: Book a consultation and receive a detailed technical plan within 48 hours.

framework.title: Project pillars
lines: Planning with captains and ETOs to size networks and racks.
Integration of Starlink, Peplink, Fortinet and Crestron tailored to each onboard scenario.
24/7 remote monitoring and fast support during the season.

pillars.title: 24/7 support
pillars.description: Remote monitoring, alerts and coordination with crew in minutes.

pillars.title: Boutique integration
pillars.description: We work with certified installers while respecting every interior detail.

pillars.title: Clear documentation
pillars.description: Digital manuals and quick-start guides for crew and owners.

connectivity.name: Worldwide Connectivity
connectivity.shortDescription: Resilient multi-WAN combining Starlink, 4G/5G and WiFi 6 to keep the yacht always online.

benefits.title: Intelligent multi-WAN
benefits.description: Starlink LEO, 4G/5G and VSAT links with automatic failover.

benefits.title: Premium WiFi 6
benefits.description: Full coverage onboard with QoS and segmentation for crew and guests.

benefits.title: 24/7 remote management
benefits.description: Continuous supervision and immediate adjustments for every route and berth.

process.title: Signal audit
process.description: We study routes, marinas and existing racks.

process.title: Redundant architecture
process.description: Multi-link design with load balancing and automatic failover.

process.title: QoS optimisation
process.description: Priority for critical apps and guest profiles.

process.title: Continuous monitoring
process.description: Cloud dashboard with alerts and proactive support.

hero.description: We build connectivity systems with automatic failover, load balancing and proactive monitoring for Mediterranean passages and beyond.

caseStudy.challenge: Dropouts when combining Starlink and 4G/5G on long passages.
caseStudy.solution: Managed multi-WAN with prioritisation policies and VSAT backup.
caseStudy.result: Availability above 99 percent and recovery in under ten seconds.

faq.question: Do I need to subscribe to Starlink?
faq.answer: We integrate Starlink when it adds value, but we always combine multiple providers to maintain redundancy.

faq.question: Is remote support included?
faq.answer: Yes, we monitor the links 24/7 and coordinate adjustments with the crew.

cybersecurity.name: Cybersecurity
cybersecurity.shortDescription: Robust digital perimeters with next-generation firewalls, segmentation and recurring audits.

benefits.title: NGFW management
benefits.description: Fortinet and Peplink firewalls with custom rules and continuous updates.

benefits.title: Advanced segmentation
benefits.description: Separate networks for crew, guests, automation and instrumentation.

benefits.title: IoT hardening
benefits.description: Controlled firmware, secure access and Zero Trust policies for every device.

process.title: Policy design
process.description: Definition of VLANs, authentication and logging.

process.title: Recurring review
process.description: Pen tests and quarterly improvement plans.

hero.description: We protect networks, IoT devices and sensitive data with policies tailored to crew, guests and navigation systems.

caseStudy.challenge: Guest access compromised navigation and entertainment networks.
caseStudy.solution: We segmented into four layers with multifactor authentication and Zero Trust policies.
caseStudy.result: Zero incidents last season and a successful external audit.

faq.question: Do you train the crew?
faq.answer: Yes, we deliver awareness sessions and provide best-practice guides.

faq.question: What happens after the audit?
faq.answer: You receive a prioritised risk report and we support the implementation.

av-integration.name: AV System Integration
av-integration.shortDescription: Immersive entertainment with 4K distribution, zoned audio and bespoke automation.

benefits.title: 4K distribution
benefits.description: UHD matrices sending content to any area without noticeable latency.

benefits.title: Zoned audio
benefits.description: Independent control per cabin with scenes tailored to every guest.

benefits.title: Versatile spaces
benefits.description: Salons configured for cinema, briefings or private entertainment.

process.title: Use-case discovery
process.description: We define scenarios with owners and crew.

process.title: Technical design
process.description: Selection of Crestron, Sonos, IPTV and Plex servers.

process.title: Automation integration
process.description: Touch interfaces and control from personal devices.

process.title: Continuous calibration
process.description: Remote support and fine-tuning during navigation.

hero.description: We transform salons and sky lounges into cinematic, meeting or private entertainment spaces managed through Crestron.

caseStudy.challenge: Fragmented AV experiences and difficult crew control
caseStudy.solution: We implemented a 4K matrix, hidden audio and predefined Crestron scenes.
caseStudy.result: Intuitive use and complete satisfaction from guests and crew.

faq.question: Can we reuse existing equipment?
faq.answer: Yes, we integrate current hardware and combine it with new solutions when needed.

faq.question: Do you offer remote fine-tuning?
faq.answer: We monitor the system and perform updates or adjustments on demand.

iot-surveillance.name: IoT & Video Surveillance Systems
iot-surveillance.shortDescription: Integrated automation with smart cabin control, lighting and secure CCTV access.

benefits.title: Centralised platform
benefits.description: Scenes, alerts and status in real time for crew and owners.

benefits.title: Personalised cabins
benefits.description: Each guest adjusts ambience and entertainment from their device.

benefits.title: Advanced surveillance
benefits.description: Multi-room streaming, redundant recording and encrypted access.

process.title: IoT inventory
process.description: Review of sensors, actuators and existing cameras.

process.title: NMEA 2000 integration
process.description: We connect navigation data and alarms to the cloud.

process.title: Scene automation
process.description: Programming day/night, docking or cruising modes.

process.title: Crew training
process.description: We train personnel and deliver digital manuals.

hero.description: We integrate lighting, climate, NMEA 2000 monitoring and CCTV within a single platform accessible anywhere.

caseStudy.challenge: No centralised control and no secure remote access.
caseStudy.solution: We deployed an IoT platform with cabin scenes and CCTV with reinforced authentication.
caseStudy.result: Crew response times dropped while owners monitor the yacht from shore.

faq.question: Which devices do you support?
faq.answer: We integrate KNX lighting, climate systems, NMEA 2000 devices and compatible IP cameras.

faq.question: Can we access the system from shore?
faq.answer: Yes, we enable encrypted remote access with multifactor authentication.

timeline.milestone: Netnautica launches from Palma de Mallorca.
First full project: Starlink connectivity, cybersecurity and multi-room AV.
24/7 remote support expands across the Balearics, Barcelona and Cote dAzur.

culture.title: How we work
items: Initial technical audit and clear documentation for the crew.
Direct communication with captains and shipyards during integration.
Remote monitoring, scheduled visits and immediate support in season.

sidebar.copy: We coordinate each deployment with your crew, shipyard and trusted vendors.
